# Problem 1

## Load Transit Data

```{r}
NYC_Transit_df <- read_csv(
  "Local_Data_Files/NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv")

NYC_Transit_df <- 
  NYC_Transit_df %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
  

head(NYC_Transit_df)

```

Inspect Characteristics of the Data Frame
```{r}
nrows_NYC <- nrow(NYC_Transit_df)
nrows_NYC

ncols_NYC <- ncol(NYC_Transit_df)

col_names_NYC

```
